<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Beastmaster's Trance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1904) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 160 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=50)

**Prerequisites**
[Beastmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1900)

</column>

---

You can enter a trance that allows you to briefly inhabit the body of one of your animal companions and share its senses. You gain the focus spell [_beastmaster trance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=661). Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Beastmaster's Trance
